dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""You are the angriest man I know, R..."
dialogueTree.english: "You are the angriest man I know, René."
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Ты самы злы чалавек, якога я ведаю, Рэнэ».

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Not bad, René, you might stand a c..."
dialogueTree.english: "Not bad, René, you might stand a chance this time."
dialogueTree.polish: „Nieźle, René, tym razem masz nawet jakieś szanse”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Нядрэнна, Рэнэ, на гэты раз у цябе нават ёсць нейкія шанцы».

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Argh.. my back! I swear it's getti..."
dialogueTree.english: "Argh.. my back! I swear it's getting worse..."
dialogueTree.polish: „Ach... moje plecy! Słowo daję, jest coraz gorzej...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Ах... мае спіна! Шчыра, становіцца ўсё горш...»

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Yes, yes, the good old days. The a..."
dialogueTree.english: "Yes, yes, the good old days. The all or nothing days."
dialogueTree.polish: „Tak, tak, kiedyś to było. Żyło się na sto procent”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Так, так, калісьці гэта было. Жылі на сто адсоткаў».

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""*Mon dieu*, the pain is exceptiona..."
dialogueTree.english: "*Mon dieu*, the pain is exceptionally bad today..."
dialogueTree.polish: „*Mon dieu*, dzisiaj to już boli koszmarnie...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «*Mon dieu*, сёння гэта ўжо жудасна баліць...»

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""How long have we known each other?..."
dialogueTree.english: "How long have we known each other? Almost eighty years?"
dialogueTree.polish: „Jak długo się znamy? Prawie osiemdziesiąt lat?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: «Як доўга мы знаёмы? Амаль восемдзесят гадоў?»

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""Would you like to play alone tomor..."
dialogueTree.english: "Would you like to play alone tomorrow?"

dialogueTree.title: Gaston Martin: ""I'll just measure... *ouch*. I can..."
dialogueTree.english: "I'll just measure... *ouch*. I can barely move..."
